title: Pulakesh Pradhan
text: I am a Geographer and Spatial Data Scientist specialized in GIS and Remote Sensing. My work leverages Google Earth Engine and AI to solve complex spatial problems.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in my Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this is a blog for a geographer, expect to see posts about GIS, remote sensing, and spatial analysis here.

title: Publications
text:
Book: Modern Cartography Series Year: 2024 View Publication | Download PDF
This study analyzes agricultural drought in Paschim Medinipur, West Bengal, using Google Earth Engine with satellite and climate datasets from 2002‚Äì2022. It assesses precipitation variability, drought indices, vegetation responses, and climate trends.



Book: Google Earth Engine and Artificial Intelligence for Earth Observation Year: 2025 View Publication | Download PDF
This study demonstrates the use of AHP in Google Earth Engine to identify vulnerable areas for flood hazards in Odisha. Key parameters include elevation, rainfall, land cover, slope, TWI, NDVI, and soil.
